TestCase.TestCaseTitle: Update IED discovery IEDEvent IsFeintIndicator to 'true'.
TestCase.TestCaseObjective: BSO validation. Test whether the Producer/Provider is able to create and update the feint information of an IED discovery IEDEvent and the Consumers/Receivers are able to understand (and display) it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseScenario: The Producer creates an IED discovery IEDEvent with IsFeintIndicator = 'false'. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly. The Producer updates the feint information of this IEDEvent to 'true'. The Consumers receive the information and interpret it correctly.
TestCase.TestCaseEnvironment: Internet or Co-located. Exchange Pattern: R/R, P/S.
TestCase.TestCasePreCondition: The Producer/Provider has created a topic which includes message elements belonging to the Event message schema area. The Consumers have subscribed to this topic.
TestCase.TestCaseConclusion: This test is considered a success if the IEDEvent and its feint information is processed and interpreted correctly on all Nations' C2IS.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction:
The Producer (1) creates an IEDEvent with name XXX_IEDF_920 and with the following feint information: * IncidentCode = 'IEDDiscovery' * IsFeintIndicator = 'false'
Notices: XXX in name of the object is meant (in principle) to be replaced by the 3 letter code of the country name. Example for the name of the IEDEvent: FRA_ IEDF_920.
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.

TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepAction: The Producer (1) updates the IEDEvent with the following feint information: * IsFeintIndicator = 'true'
TestCaseStep.TestCaseStepResult: Consumers (2) receive and display the IEDEvent correctly.
